inclusion.criterion: Adult (<18 years) Male and female T1 & T2DM patients who can sign an informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Insulin treatment (at least one injection a day) prior to hospitalization for at least half a year.
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has had type 1 diabetes for 11 years and has been on insulin since diagnosis. He reports previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis, but is not experiencing any symptoms with this episode.
